TopicTitle: Space Shuttle Pack for ksp 1.0.4 dev thread

Articles.Content: can anyone help me fly this? I end up unable to pitch away from the horizon and it rolls a lot
hmmm. yes I could definitely do with some help with the aerodynamics... even just people who can tweak it and see what works

ok with the shooting up problem it could be the deflection lift is way off so I am adjusting it.

ok that's fixed

I noticed I did put way too much lift just to make sure it flies. I cut it way back and it still seems to fly...

O

> 
> ok with the shooting up problem it could be the deflection lift is way off so I am adjusting it.
> ok that's fixed
> 
> I noticed I did put way too much lift just to make sure it flies. I cut it way back and it still seems to fly...

I wonder what would happen if you gave it similar or the same lift as the stock large mk3 cargo bay?

that's exactly what I did also, and copied mk3 delta wing profile. give me 5 mins and ill post another release

also can anyone find the original CSS booster anywhere. I was given a link to a download but there was no booster in it...
The new boosters are tooo long and everything just falls apart when im launching!

edit, I need to check my booster sizes...

do you use kerbal joint reinforcement?

does anyone else get this issue? please let me know

They are perfect Mike. The 5segmentBooster2 is the one that fits best. Im just having issues with the new decoupler. I like the old one better anyway. It dont requier any struts. I have also converted the 5segmentBooster2 to dds and made the color match the nose cones alot better. I also think you should stick with the Firespitter FSTextureSwitch 2 Module tha way we can lower the number of dependencies.

I will give you my CSS Folder. I just added your aero changes. I will add the texture switch to the 5segmentBooster2 and upload it for you. Give me 10 min to test it.

I don't need your css folder. just part of a cfg file... the booster don't need texture switch. the only parts with switchable textures are the crew cabin, wings, cargobay, and fuel tank.

also I just did the dds convert. thanks for the heads up

I made a lighter booster texture to look more realistic so i added it any way. And you can take my files and use them to save you some time editing all the other configs
